text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump if we can track the deaths of all US Citizens killed by #Covid19 by city, Y cant we track every US Citizen killed/raped by an illegal alien, by City? Asked @parscale @craigmelvin daily! UR suppose 2 protect US Citizens from all foreign invaders, aliens & Viruses https://t.co/tNxki5iZtc
